personalDetails.bio: B.Tech Computer Engineering student with a minor in IoT, currently an LLM Development Intern. Experienced in leading multidisciplinary teams for AI-driven product development and data analytics optimization.

education.fieldOfStudy: Computer Engineering with Minor in IoT

experience.description: Leading multidisciplinary teams in designing AI and LLM-based solutions, optimizing SFT and RLHF pipelines, and building internal data analytics systems that increased project revenue by 222%.

experience.role: Lead Business and Data Analysis Intern
experience.description: Led end-to-end analysis of customer sales data using machine learning models like ARIMA and Random Forest to optimize marketing and logistics.
Applied data analysis techniques to predict harmful algal blooms and processed large datasets for machine learning models.

projects.title: Project Phoenix
projects.description: Explainable Cervical Cancer Classification using deep learning to classify cervical cell images into diagnostic categories.

projects.title: Project Talaria
projects.description: Integrated footwear system for cardiovascular and gait analysis, combining MPU6050 and MAX30105 sensors with ESP32 firmware.

projects.title: Project Monarch
projects.description: Unified control center for product financial forecasting and cost analysis, modeling granular components like API fees and labor costs.

projects.title: Malicious Prompt Classifier
projects.description: Stochastic detection engine for adversarial LLM prompts using k-gram transition topology, achieving 90.79% accuracy on MPDD benchmarks.

projects.title: Project Icarus
projects.description: Custom drone development from scratch using Teensy 4.0 microcontroller and a fully functional flight controller in C.

projects.title: Project-Nemesis
projects.description: Citizen-focused initiative dedicated to transforming court operations in Gujarat to enhance transparency and simplify processes.

researchWork.title: Explainable Cervical Cancer Classification
researchWork.description: Architected an XAI framework leveraging ConvNeXtV2 and Efficient Net V2-S with GRADCAM for enhanced model interpretability.

researchWork.title: Malicious Prompt Classifier - Markov Chain Detection System
researchWork.description: Developed a stochastic detection engine for adversarial LLM prompts using k-gram transition topology.

positionsOfResponsibility.title: President
positionsOfResponsibility.organization: Mind Ripple - The Quizzing Club of PDEU
positionsOfResponsibility.description: Led a 30-member team in quiz design and event planning, increasing earnings by 10% through flagship events like Matrix Breakout.

positionsOfResponsibility.title: Charter President (Founder)
positionsOfResponsibility.description: Founded a team of 32 members to initiate social service projects including educational drives and healthcare aid distribution.
